title.native: 幻日のヨハネ -SUNSHINE in the MIRROR-
title.romaji: Genjitsu no Yohane: SUNSHINE in the MIRROR
title.english: YOHANE THE PARHELION -SUNSHINE in the MIRROR-

description:
The story reimagines Yoshiko Tsushima, the school idol afflicted with chuunibyou (adolescent delusions of grandeur), as a magical girl. The story is set in Numazu, a scenic harbor town surrounded by the sea and mountains. Ever since she was little, the girl Yohane has never fit in, and has always felt apart from everyone in town. Her aspirations and true place in this world lie elsewhere. The story follows this girl who can't follow rules as she journeys into the mysterious world.

(Source: Anime News Network, edited)

Note: The project was initially teased as an April Fools' Day joke in 2022, and later formally announced in June during Day 2 of the "Aqours 6th LoveLive! ~KU-RU-KU-RU Rock 'n' Roll TOUR~" Tokyo dome concert.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Rural
tags.description: Partly or completely set in the countryside.

tags.name: Cute Girls Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around female characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Medieval
tags.description: Partially or completely set in the Middle Ages or a Middle Ages-inspired setting. Commonly features elements such as European castles and knights.

tags.name: Animals
tags.description: Prominently features animal characters in a leading role.

tags.name: Coming of Age
tags.description: Centers around a character's transition from childhood to adulthood.

tags.name: Idol
tags.description: Centers around the life and activities of an idol.

tags.name: Chuunibyou
tags.description: Prominently features a character with "Middle School 2nd Year Syndrome", who either acts like a know-it-all adult or falsely believes they have special powers.

tags.name: Iyashikei
tags.description: Primary aim is to heal the audience through serene depictions of characters' daily lives.

tags.name: Fairy
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a fairy.

tags.name: Anachronism
tags.description: Prominently features elements that are out of place in the historical period the work takes place in, particularly modern elements in a historical setting.

tags.name: Tokusatsu
tags.description: Prominently features elements that resemble special effects in Japanese live-action shows

tags.name: CGI
tags.description: Prominently features scenes created with computer-generated imagery.

tags.name: Motorcycles
tags.description: Prominently features the use of motorcycles.

tags.name: Ninja
tags.description: Prominently features Japanese warriors traditionally trained in espionage, sabotage and assasination.

alternative: Normalzilla Chika-chi (普通怪獣ちかちー)
Little Demon Lily (リトルデーモンリリー)

node.description: Sakurako’s work is based on her own experiences, with [Sister Princess](https://anilist.co/manga/38414/) coming from having a brother, [Strawberry Panic!](https://anilist.co/manga/34974/) coming from attending an all-girls school, and [Baby Princess](https://anilist.co/manga/38676/) from having a lot of cousins.

[Website](http://www.yatate.net/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/yatate_hajime) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/矢立肇) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hajime_Yatate)

Hajime Yatate is a collective pseudonym for [Sunrise](https://anilist.co/studio/14/)'s staff.

__[Twitter](https://twitter.com/g_kurosaki1218) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/go.kurosaki.7)__

__Birthplace:__ Yokohama City, Kanagawa Prefecture, Japan

__Gou Kurosaki__ is a Japanese CG animator, director and artist affiliated with CG studio Sublimation.

Aqours is a nine-member Japanese voice actress group under Lantis portraying the fictional school idols appeared in the multimedia project Love Live! Sunshine!!. They are presented as the main group of this second project under the Love Live! franchise. Aqours started their activities on June 30th, 2015 and released their first single "Kimi no Kokoro wa Kagayaiteru kai?" on October 7th, 2015. 

__Members:__
- [Anju Inami](https://anilist.co/staff/118577/Anju-Inami) as [Chika Takami](https://anilist.co/character/89844/Chika-Takami)
- [Rikako Aida](https://anilist.co/staff/119900/Rikako-Aida) as [Riko Sakurauchi](https://anilist.co/character/89845/Riko-Sakurauchi)
- [Nanaka Suwa](https://anilist.co/staff/119901/Nanaka-Suwa) as [Kanan Matsuura](https://anilist.co/character/89846/Kanan-Matsuura)
- [Arisa Komiya](https://anilist.co/staff/119902/Arisa-Komiya) as [Dia Kurosawa](https://anilist.co/character/89847/Dia-Kurosawa)
- [Shuka Saito](https://anilist.co/staff/119903/Shuka-Saitou) as [You Watanabe](https://anilist.co/character/89848/You-Watanabe)
- [Aika Kobayashi](https://anilist.co/staff/119904/Aika-Kobayashi) as [Yoshiko Tsushima](https://anilist.co/character/89849/Yoshiko-Tsushima)
- [Kanako Takatsuki](https://anilist.co/staff/119905/Kanako-Takatsuki) as [Hanamaru Kunikida](https://anilist.co/character/89850/Hanamaru-Kunikida)
- [Aina Suzuki](https://anilist.co/staff/119438/Aina-Suzuki) as [Mari Ohara](https://anilist.co/character/89851/Mari-Ohara)
- [Ai Furihata](https://anilist.co/staff/119906/Ai-Furihata) as [Ruby Kurokawa](https://anilist.co/character/89852/Ruby-Kurosawa)

Affiliated with Studio Live. Admires [Kazuko Tadano](https://anilist.co/staff/118426/).

Her designs are very shoujo manga like, often featuring glittering eyes.
Son of extremely influential animator [Yasuji Mori](https://anilist.co/staff/103602/).
